meanings.definition: Not broadcast on television or radio.
meanings.sent1: The unaired episode of the show was never seen by the public.
meanings.sent2: The unaired pilot did not make it to the TV screen.
meanings.sent3: The unaired scenes were like hidden treasures for the fans to discover.
meanings.sent4: Her unaired thoughts remained private and undisclosed.
meanings.sent5: The unaired footage was locked away, waiting to be revealed.

meanings.definition: Not exposed to air; not ventilated.
meanings.sent1: The unaired room felt stuffy and musty.
meanings.sent2: The unaired basement had a damp and musty smell.
meanings.sent3: The unaired closet was filled with forgotten items.
meanings.sent4: His unaired shoes were hidden away in the back of the wardrobe.
meanings.sent5: The unaired attic was dusty and filled with old memories.
